page.title: 11Places People Live
page.content: Housing schemes around{Westmarch {Primary School}include Westmarch,Kirkton,Trottick and Downfield. Most of the housing is situated near to the foothills of the Sidlaw Hills. Because of this there is a lot of natural wildlife in and around the area in the form of mammals, insects and birds as well as the odd schoolboy! Semi-detached houses with gardens make up most of the housing but there are also tenements, bungalows, maisonettes, multi-storeys and detached houses. {The Dighty Burn}flows parallel to Harestane Road (across from our school).At the moment it is really rather a mess, but if it was cleaned up it could be a nice place to visit. It would take a long time to do this but in the end it would be worth it. Plants could be put in to improve it.
